body_html: @zdevito Yes there was already code to emit constants inlined into the body of the FusionGroup. In particular, the graph_fuser inlines the alpha argument in add(Tensor, Tensor, Scalar alpha) into the FusionGroup if it is constant. I took this logic and expanded it to work with all constant number arguments.
body_text: @zdevito Yes there was already code to emit constants inlined into the body of the FusionGroup. In particular, the graph_fuser inlines the alpha argument in add(Tensor, Tensor, Scalar alpha) into the FusionGroup if it is constant. I took this logic and expanded it to work with all constant number arguments.
body: @zdevito Yes there was already code to emit constants inlined into the body of the FusionGroup. In particular, the graph_fuser inlines the `alpha` argument in `add(Tensor, Tensor, Scalar alpha)` into the FusionGroup if it is constant. I took this logic and expanded it to work with all constant number arguments.
